src:
Janaina: “Por que querem tanto neutralizar a promotora?”

02 Nov 2019, 09:12

No Twitter, Janaina Paschoal comentou o afastamento da promotora Carmen Eliza Bastos de Carvalho, que investigava o assassinato de Marielle Franco:
“Fica a dúvida: Por que querem tanto neutralizar a promotora?”, questionou.
“Significativas as manifestações dos pais de Marielle e da esposa de Anderson, em defesa do trabalho da promotora afastada das apurações referentes a morte da vereadora e de seu motorista. Homenageio todos os que partiram na memória de ambos.”
Como registramos mais cedo, os pais de Marielle lamentaram o afastamento da promotora da investigação dos assassinatos de Marielle e do motorista Anderson Gomes.
text:
Janaina: “Why do you want to neutralize the promoter so much?”

02 Nov 2019, 09:12

On Twitter, Janaina Paschoal commented on the removal of prosecutor Carmen Eliza Bastos de Carvalho, who was investigating the murder of Marielle Franco:
"The question remains: Why do you want to neutralize the promoter so badly?"
“Significant demonstrations by the parents of Marielle and Anderson's wife, in defense of the prosecutor's work away from the findings concerning the death of the councilwoman and her driver. I honor all those who left in their memory. ”
As we noted earlier, Marielle's parents lamented the dismissal of the prosecutor from the investigation of Marielle's murders and driver Anderson Gomes.
